-- Необработанные документы, пришедшие по МЭДО --select distinct card_id from (
select distinct c1.card_id from (
select c.card_id from card c where c.template_id in (2264) and c.status_id in (10000102) and EXISTS(select 1 from attribute_value av where (av.card_id = c.card_id) AND (av.attribute_code='CREATED') AND (av.date_value >= date_trunc('day', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '366 days')) )
union all select c.card_id from card c join attribute_value av on av.card_id = c.card_id and av.attribute_code = 'JBR_DISTR_DLV_METH' where c.template_id in (2424) and c.status_id in (10000102) and av.value_id in (1522, 1592) -- (1588, 1521, 1522, 1592) and EXISTS(select 1 from attribute_value av2 where (av2.card_id = c.card_id) AND (av2.attribute_code='CREATED') AND (av2.date_value >= date_trunc('day', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '366 days')) )
union all select c.card_id from card c join attribute_value av on c.card_id = av.card_id and av.attribute_code='REPLIC_GUID' where c.template_id in (2400) -- РК Репликации and c.status_id in (10001056) -- в статусе "Ошибка" and EXISTS(select c2.card_id from card c2 join attribute_value av2 on c2.card_id = av2.card_id and av2.attribute_code = 'REPLICATION_UUID' where c2.template_id in (224) -- шаблон "Входящий" and av2.attribute_code='REPLICATION_UUID' and av2.string_value = av.string_value ) and EXISTS(select 1 from attribute_value av3 where (av3.card_id = c.card_id) and (av3.attribute_code='CREATED') and (av3.date_value >= date_trunc('day', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '366 days')) ) ) as c1
